issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Upgrade from studio 3 to studio 4

h3. Actual Result
The dialog apears after opening or closing any file in the IDE

h3. Expected Result
Dialog should not appear

comments.body:
[~scott.mason] can you please add more info?
What dialog are you seeing?
Please send details of your environment

Thanks

I thought the logs files would be attached.

The dialog says

An eror has occurred. See error log for more details.
com.aptana.usage.StudioAnalytics.getInstance()Lcom/aptana/usage/StudioAnalytics;

Here is the relevant entry from the log file:
